name: Double D Dodgeball
description: Local Multiplayer 2-4, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-8, HD (High Definition). Game is in English only. 3, 2, 1, GO! Grab three of your friends to play against another team of four in this intense retro-style dodgeball game! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
